column1: Patient arrives, via hospital wheelchair, Gait steady, History obtained from patient, Patient appears comfortable, Patient cooperative, alert, Oriented to person, place and time.
column2: Complex assessment performed, Patient arrives ambulatory, Gait steady, History obtained from, parent, Patient appears comfortable, Patient cooperative, alert, Oriented to person, place and time.

column1: oxycodone [ROXICODONE] 5 mg tablet 0.5-1 tablets by mouth every 4 hours as needed.
column2: pantoprazole [PROTONIX] 40 mg tablet enteric coated 1 tablet by mouth Bid before meals.
